meta.ogDescription: Welcome to the Fuel Documentation Portal - the ultimate resource for developers looking to build applications on Fuel. This portal provides an overview of documentation, guides, libraries and concrete examples of the Sway language to demonstrate how to build on Fuel.

heroData.title: Fuel Documentation Portal
heroData.description: Welcome to the Documentation Portal for building applications with Fuel. This portal provides documentation of the Sway language and includes concrete examples to demonstrate how Sway can be used.

gettingStartedData.title: Getting Started
gettingStartedData.description: The following guides get you started building on Fuel. This section documents how to install and use the Fuel toolchain, along with how to write your first smart contracts in Sway.

cardsData.title: Installation Guide
cardsData.description: A guide to install the Fuel toolchain, and set up your first project.

cardsData.title: Developer Quickstart
cardsData.description: A guide for writing contracts, deploying to Fuel, and building a frontend.

cardsData.title: Typescript SDK
cardsData.description: A guide for using Typescript to compile, deploy and test smart contracts on Fuel.

cardsData.title: Rust SDK
cardsData.description: A guide for using Rust to compile, deploy and test smart contracts on Fuel.

cardsData.title: GraphQL API
cardsData.description: A guide for using the Fuel GraphQL API to query the Fuel blockchain.

librariesData.title: Libraries
librariesData.description: This section provides an overview of available libraries and forkable code examples to freely import and use.

cardsData.title: Sway Examples
cardsData.description: A collection of sway smart contract sample implementations.

cardsData.title: Sway Libraries
cardsData.description: A repository of libraries that are not part of the standard library.

cardsData.title: Standard Library
cardsData.description: The official standard library for Sway.

booksData.title: Documentation
booksData.description: A collection of books that deep dive into how Fuel works.

cardsData.title: Fuel Book
cardsData.description: A book on every aspect of Fuel.

cardsData.title: Sway Book
cardsData.description: A book on sway, a smart contract programming language.

cardsData.title: Fuelup Book
cardsData.description: A book on fuelup - the package manager from official release channels.

cardsData.title: Wallet Book
cardsData.description: A book about Fuel's wallet extension.

referencesData.title: References
referencesData.description: Additional documents written for technical readers that are knowledgeable about the Fuel network.

cardsData.title: Fuel Specifications
cardsData.description: This book specifies the Fuel protocol, including the Fuel Virtual Machine.

cardsData.title: Sway Reference
cardsData.description: This book is the primary reference for the sway programming language.

cardsData.title: Forc Reference
cardsData.description: A reference guide for forc - the orchestrator manager.

cardsData.title: Contribution Guide
cardsData.description: A guide on how to contribute to sway, with contribution (RFC) standards.
